Questions?

Why am I doing this?

Because it's freakin amazing meeting new people every day and learning from each other. I think we all should set aside time to share what we've learned, because were all awesome at something.

Are you charging for this?

Nope. It's 100% free. I think it's much more fun when there's no money involved. Don't get me wrong, I like to make money, but there are a million other ways to do it. Like Powerball.

Will it be awkward?

My sister said this is like a scheduled chat roulette. I wake up every morning and have no idea who I'm about to chat with. I could talk for HOURS about ideas and building awesome things, so no it won't be awkward.
